title: Trickery Domain
content:
Concentration

Protect a creature from attacks increase: Increase its Armour Class by 2

18m/60ft Concentration

Heal your allies and increase their hit point maximum by 5 hit points

Limit a foes sight range. It is easier to hit, and the creature will miss more often.Attack Rolls against it have Advantage and the foe attacks with Disadvantage.

Range: 18m CON Save

Humanoids can't be Charmed, Frightened, or become enraged.

Range: 18m Radius: 6m Concentration
